EmailTemplate.subject: Learn About Apache HAWQ (incubating) - The Advanced Hadoop-Native SQL Database
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, November 19, 2015 JOIN HERE <https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/hawqnest/> Join us here <https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/hawqnest/> for the first official virtual meetup of the Apache HAWQ (incubating) community this Nov 19. No registration is necessary. To receive reminders of this event, please subscribe to the Apache HAWQ user email list <mailto:user-subscribe@hawq.incubator.apache.org>.
Apache HAWQ (incubating) is a massively parallel processing, Hadoop-native SQL analytics database that operatives directly in HDFS. As a hybrid of an MPP database and Hadoop, it inherits key features from both parties. It is highly SQL compliant, extremely fast and scalable. Unlike other SQL engines on Hadoop, it is fully transactional.
In this talk, Dr. Lei Chang provides an overview on HAWQ architecture and opportunities for contributions and collaboration with the Apache community. He will also introduce a simple pathway for contributors to bring their innovative ideas for the HAWQ kernel.
Join us here <https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/hawqnest/> for this virtual meeting of the Apache HAWQ community. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
11/19 San Francisco, CA 4:00 PM PST UTC-8 hours 11/19 New York, NY 7:00 PM EST UTC-5 hours 11/20 Beijing, China 8:00 AM CST UTC+8 hours
To receive reminders of this event, please subscribe to the Apache HAWQ user email list <mailto:user-subscribe@hawq.incubator.apache.org>.
About the speaker: Dr. Lei Chang is the Engineering Director for Apache HAWQ at Pivotal Software. He is the co-creator and architect of HAWQ. Before joining Pivotal and was a senior research scientist in EMC. His main research area focused on parallel database, data analytics and cloud computing. He is published widely on data management and data mining, spoken at conferences and holds dozens of US patents. Dr. Lei Chang holds a PhD in databases from Peking University.
We look forward to having you join us.
